JPackage 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    Reference

    All functions

    clean_embeds()

    Quickly reformat a sentence transformers embedding output

    clean_entities()

    Quickly extract columns of interest from Hugging Face entity recognisers

    context_grabber()

    Retrieve the 1-5 word boundaries before and 1-10 after a pattern.

    count_multiple()

    Count multiple factors

    fix_radarly()

    Quickly wrangle a couple of annoying columns from Radarly outputs

    get_tags()

    Retrieve hashtags and at_tags from text

    huggingface_quick_clean()

    Run some fast text normalisation steps for output to Huggingface

    make_bigram_viz()

    Plot a bigram network

    make_top_terms_table()

    Quickly make a top terms table from UMAP/Sentence Transformers/kMeans clusters

    par_fit_LDAs()

    Parallelised fit_LDAs function + coherence included.

    percent_summ()

    Count a factor and then add a column which shows percentage

    plot_bars_coherence()

    Plot intra-topic coherence bar charts

    plot_group_bigrams()

    Make a bigram network for each level of a categorical variable

    plot_k_coherence()

    Scree plot for topic coherence analysis

    sample_pull()

    Quickly view a sample of any variable

    save_plot_list()

    Save a list of plots

    spam_grams()

    Remove posts with suspicious n-grams

    tidy_huggingface_zeroshot()

    Tidy a zero-shot classifier output and join with original text variable

    top_terms_plot()

    Make faceted lollipop charts for top terms from a cluster

    umap_shiny()

    Builds a Shiny app that can be used to label embedded texts quickly

    Contents

    Developed by Jack Penzer.
